cmd.name: Ritual Chamber
cmd.description: Allows druids to gain experience by learning from more experienced allies

cmd.name: Ghoul Summoning
cmd.description: Allows druids to sacrifice themselves to summon a Ghoul that drains the health of all nearby enemies for about 10 seconds
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Ghoul Summoning, default

cmd.name: Eagle Summoning
cmd.description: Allows druids to sacrifice themselves to summon an eagle that remains under your control for about 2 minutes
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Eagle Summoning, default

cmd.name: Restoration
cmd.description: Allows druids to sacrifice themselves to restore the stamina of 5 nearby allies.\nThe same effect also applies every time that a druid dies
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Restoration, default

cmd.name: Reincarnation Ritual
cmd.description: Every time that a druid dies, either a bear or a boar of the same level is spawned and remains under your control for about 30 seconds
cmd.param: ReqPlr, Ritual Chamber, default, NamePlr, Reincarnation Ritual, default
